name: Candace
storytext: The crimson sand flows, an oath to defend.
source: Reward for inviting Candace to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum

skills.description: Attaches a Heron Shield to this character and prepares Heron Strike.

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> and creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prayer of the Crimson Crown</color>.
